name: ICSMedium
title: ICS Medium
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Inhaled Corticosteroids with medium dose of medication per actuator),(Data Element Scope: DRUG_CLASS_MEMBERS: PHARMACOLOGIC:),(Inclusion Criteria: All generics (with different strengths) , brands (with different strengths) includes ingridients (IN),clinical drug component (SCDC),  clinical/ generic drug pack (GPCK), clinical dose form (SCDG), brand name (BN) ,branded drug component (SBDC),  and branded drug pack (BPCK)),(Exclusion Criteria: RxCUIs with TTY of DF or DFG)
